verses.verse: My son, <S%H1121><s%> keep <S%H8104><s%> my words, <S%H561><s%> And treasure <S%H6845><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> within <S%H854><s%> you.
Keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> and live, <S%H2421><s%> And my teaching <S%H8451><s%> as the apple <S%H380><s%> of your eye. <S%H5869><s%>
Bind <S%H7194><s%> them on your fingers; <S%H676><s%> Write <S%H3789><s%> them on the tablet <S%H3871><s%> of your heart. <S%H3820><s%>
Say <S%H559><s%> to wisdom, <S%H2451><s%> "You are my sister, <S%H269><s%>" And call <S%H7121><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> [your] intimate <S%H4129><s%> friend; <S%H4129><s%>
That they may keep <S%H8104><s%> you from an adulteress, <S%H802><s%> <S%H2114><s%> From the foreigner <S%H5237><s%> who flatters <S%H9140><s%> with her words. <S%H561><s%>
For at the window <S%H2474><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> I looked <S%H8259><s%> out through <S%H1157><s%> my lattice, <S%H822><s%>
And I saw <S%H7200><s%> among the naive, <S%H6612><s%> I discerned <S%H995><s%> among the youths, <S%H1121><s%> A young <S%H5288><s%> man <S%H5288><s%> lacking <S%H2638><s%> sense, <S%H3820><s%>
Passing <S%H5674><s%> through the street <S%H7784><s%> near <S%H681><s%> her corner; <S%H6438><s%> And he takes <S%H6805><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> to her house, <S%H1004><s%>
In the twilight, <S%H5399><s%> in the evening, <S%H6153><s%> <S%H3117><s%> In the middle <S%H380><s%> of the night <S%H3915><s%> and [in] the darkness. <S%H653><s%>
And behold, <S%H2009><s%> a woman <S%H802><s%> [comes] to meet <S%H7122><s%> him, Dressed <S%H7897><s%> as a harlot <S%H2181><s%> and cunning <S%H5341><s%> of heart. <S%H3820><s%>
She is boisterous <S%H1993><s%> and rebellious; <S%H5637><s%> Her feet <S%H7272><s%> do not remain <S%H7931><s%> at home; <S%H1004><s%>
[She is] now <S%H6471><s%> in the streets, <S%H2351><s%> now <S%H6471><s%> in the squares, <S%H7339><s%> And lurks <S%H693><s%> by every <S%H3605><s%> corner. <S%H6438><s%>
So she seizes <S%H2388><s%> him and kisses <S%H5401><s%> him, And with a brazen <S%H5810><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> she says <S%H559><s%> to him:
"I was due <S%H5921><s%> to offer <S%H2077><s%> peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings; <S%H8002><s%> Today <S%H3117><s%> I have paid <S%H9608><s%> my vows. <S%H5088><s%>

"Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I have come <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> you, To seek <S%H7836><s%> your presence <S%H6440><s%> earnestly, <S%H7836><s%> and I have found <S%H4672><s%> you.
"I have spread <S%H7234><s%> my couch <S%H6210><s%> with coverings, <S%H4765><s%> With colored <S%H2405><s%> linens <S%H330><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>
"I have sprinkled <S%H5130><s%> my bed <S%H4904><s%> With myrrh, <S%H4753><s%> aloes <S%H174><s%> and cinnamon. <S%H7076><s%>

"Come, <S%H1980><s%> let us drink <S%H7301><s%> our fill <S%H7301><s%> of love <S%H1730><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> morning; <S%H1242><s%> Let us delight <S%H5965><s%> ourselves with caresses. <S%H159><s%>
"For the man <S%H376><s%> is not at home, <S%H1004><s%> He has gone <S%H1980><s%> on a long <S%H7350><s%> <S%H4970><s%> journey; <S%H1870><s%>
He has taken <S%H3947><s%> a bag <S%H6872><s%> of money <S%H3701><s%> with him, At full <S%H3677><s%> moon <S%H3677><s%> he will come <S%H935><s%> home. <S%H1004><s%> "
With her many <S%H7230><s%> persuasions <S%H3948><s%> she entices <S%H5186><s%> him; With her flattering <S%H9141><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%> she seduces <S%H5080><s%> him.

Suddenly <S%H6597><s%> he follows <S%H1980><s%> <S%H310><s%> her, As an ox <S%H7794><s%> goes <S%H935><s%> to the slaughter, <S%H2874><s%> Or as [one in] fetters <S%H5914><s%> to the discipline <S%H4148><s%> of a fool, <S%H191><s%>

Until <S%H5704><s%> an arrow <S%H2671><s%> pierces <S%H6398><s%> through <S%H6398><s%> his liver; <S%H3516><s%> As a bird <S%H6833><s%> hastens <S%H4116><s%> to the snare, <S%H6341><s%> So he does not know <S%H3045><s%> that it [will cost him] his life. <S%H5315><s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, [my] sons, <S%H1121><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me, And pay <S%H7181><s%> attention <S%H7181><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
Do not let your heart <S%H3820><s%> turn <S%H7847><s%> aside <S%H7847><s%> to her ways, <S%H1870><s%> Do not stray <S%H8582><s%> into her paths. <S%H9350><s%>
For many <S%H7227><s%> are the victims <S%H2491><s%> she has cast <S%H5307><s%> down, <S%H5307><s%> And numerous <S%H6099><s%> are all <S%H3605><s%> her slain. <S%H2026><s%>
Her house <S%H1004><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> to Sheol, <S%H7585><s%> Descending <S%H3381><s%> to the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>
